select count(cs.call_id) as cnt from pgsds.csct cs left outer join code_details cd on cs.site_type = cd.id and cd.code_id = '3000' where 1 = 1
and cs.site_id like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%')

select cs.created_at , cs.call_id , cs.site_id , cs.site_type
, cd.name as typeName
, cs.title , cs.contents , cs.created_by , cs.updated_at , cs.trx_dt , cs.trx_contents , cs.sms_yn , cs.trx_by from pgsds.csct cs left outer join code_details cd on cs.site_type = cd.id and cd.code_id = '3000' where 1 = 1
and cs.site_id like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%')
order by cs.created_at desc
order by cs.call_id desc
limit #{pageIdx}, #{pageSize}
